QUESTION_1.body: How do you prefer to approach work?
options: I like to work alone with ocassional brainstorming.
I enjoy a balance between collaboration and working alone.
I prefer to work in a group setting.

QUESTION_3.body: What is your relationship with technology/software?
options: I prefer to not deal with technical problems.
I can use basic technologies but I dislike troubleshooting.
I like to figure out new tools and systems.
I deeply enjoy learning and solving technical problems.

QUESTION_4.body: What is the most appealing workplace?
options: Mostly indoor with ocassional outdoor work.
Mix of fieldwork, nature, and office.

QUESTION_5.body: What role do you prefer on a team?
options: I prefer to follow instructions and contribute my part.
I like to offer ideas but not be in charge.
I enjoy leading small projects or mentoring peers.
I aim to be in a management or leadership position.

QUESTION_6.body: I prefer to work in an environment where priorities and tasks change often.

QUESTION_7.body: I would like to travel frequently for my career.

QUESTION_8.body: I enjoy identifying problems and developing practical/creative solutions.

QUESTION_11.body: I easily get lost with a good book.

QUESTION_12.body: I would prefer a job that requires physical movement or keeps me active.

QUESTION_13.body: I am self motivated and prefer setting my own goals/scheduels.

QUESTION_15.body: I want to be my own boss and run my own business.

QUESTION_16.body: I want to work flexible hours.

QUESTION_17.body: Long-term job security is important to me.

QUESTION_18.body: How important is creativitiy in your career?
options: I prefer structured and clear procedure in my work.
I enjoy small creative tasks such as writing/design.
I want the opportunity to sometimes brainstorm and innovate
I need full creative freedom in my career.

QUESTION_19.body: How import is social impact in your career?
options: I prefer to focus on personal growth and income.
I prefer to have my work help other indirectly.
I want a job that improves individual lives.
I want a job that improves global issues and focus on large-scale change.

QUESTION_20.body: What level of education do you expect to have?
options: High school diploma or trade certification

QUESTION_21.body: I like to work with my hands.

QUESTION_22.body: What do you enjoy in your free time?
options: Solving puzzles or playing strategy games.

QUESTION_23.body: I enjoy teaching or mentoring others.
